attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore To Get A Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: To get Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood for his amazing massive fundraising effort for our NHS and a WW2 War Hero.
attributes.background: After winning the battle in WW2 and becoming a War Hero, and at the age of 99 had to fight the CORONAVIRUS in Hospital and winning the battle to over come it and be well enough to Walk for our NHS and raising well over 8 Million which is growing hour by hour, day by day.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
